title: Revisiting the unified principle for single-atom electrocatalysts in the sulfur reduction reaction: from liquid to solid-state electrolytes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6034-6045
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01885K, Paper
Jiadong Shen, Ziwei Liang, Tengteng Gu, Zhaoyu Sun, Yiwen Wu, Xiaoqin Liu, Junhao Liu, Xiuying Zhang, Jiangwen Liu, Lei Shen, Min Zhu, Jun Liu
A new descriptor (λ) for lithium polysulfides (LPSs) conversion involving d–p coupling on catalyst surfaces. Our model, validated by DFT calculations and machine-learning algorithms, explains LPSs dynamics and improves Li–S battery performance.
